item.title: devenv lifcycle
item.description: To destroy the developer environment, including data in databases: devenv destroy To stop the developer environment (which persists the state of the environment, unlike devenv destroy): devenv stop To restart the developer environment after stopping it: devenv start To initialize a new developer environment (this exits immediately if it detects that a dev-environment has already started to be provisioned): devenv provision To deploy additional services, use the devenv apps deploy $APP_NAME flag, where $APP_NAME is the name of your service’s GitHub repository.

item.title: System Requirements
item.description: macOS # Make sure that Homebrew is installed, then download the Brewfile, and run with it in the current directory: brew bundle Linux / WSL2 # Install the following: jq: sudo apt install jq Docker
